headline: Elon Musk Buys Tesla Stock for First Time Since 2020, Shares Jump
summary: Tesla  stock was soaring after Elon Musk bought shares for the first time since 2020.  Shares of Tesla were up 6.3% at $420.69 in early trading, while the  and  were up 0.4% and 0.1%, respectively.  The jump came after Musk disclosed purchases of 2.6 million shares worth about $1 billion made on Friday.
